site_name: Plot H5 Within Land Bound By New Kent Road (A201) To The North Rodney Place And Rodney Road To The East Wansey Street To The South And Walworth Road (A215) And Elephant Road To The West. London SE17
description: Application for the approval of reserved matters (layout and appearance only) for Plot H5 within Elephant Park submitted pursuant to the Outline Planning Permission ref. 12/AP/1092. The proposal incorporates changes to the allocation of uses at ground and first floor, the attachment of a shopfront design guide, and minor external and internal amendments to the ground floor and tower crown of the development approved by reserved matters approval ref. 17/AP/2269 (Approval of reserved matters (access, scale, appearance, layout and landscaping) for plot H5 within Elephant Park (previously referred to as the Heygate Masterplan) submitted pursuant to Outline Planning Permission ref 12/AP/1092). The revised proposal results in the buildings between 8 and 25 storeys in height (maximum building height 85.415 m AOD), comprising 384 residential units, 804 sqm (GEA) of flexible retail (A1-A5) uses, 684 sqm (GEA) of flexible retail, office and leisure uses (A1-A5/B1/D2), 121 sqm (GEA) of flexible retail and office uses (A1-A5/B1) car parking, cycle storage, servicing, plant areas, new landscaping and other associated works.
